page.title: 06MARDEN FARM ESTATE
page.content: Marden Farm Estate has been farmed on for many centuries,possibly since before the year AD 1000 Roman remains were dug up when building began.Maren today consists of 143 detached,1288 semi-detached and 411 terraced houses built in the early 1960's.All houses have colourful gardens,streets lined with many trees- cherry blossom,copper beech and laburnum.Although he now lives in London the family of the pop star STING still live here.Mr.Les Pinchen,aged 79 years,has lived here since Marden was built,he enjoys playing Bingo,lectures at Centre Club and Wednesdays at Luncheon Club.Many homes have pets.Of 100 homes surveyed 60 had dogs,34 kept cats;many homes had more than pet.A housing development is to be built soon on a market garden site.
